name: Pesterquest^2
description:
The official compilation of all of my Pesterquest fanroutes! Currently containing Tavros, Gamzee, and Vriska. This is a passion project with a lot of heart and work put into it.

Credit tavr1spr1te on Twitter for the script, archivalObituar on Twitter for minor sprite edits and coding help, Hartmannn_ on Twitter for the Vriska route endcard.

All up-to-date versions of the game are found here at the Google Drive:

https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1ngkRLgMREfZbyNgDNW1D28Au5CFakfq_
